Generation VII.Sun: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.
Generation VII.Moon: It wanders around in a never-ending search for food. At dusk, it collapses from exhaustion and falls asleep on the spot.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it will eat anything, it prefers fresh living things, so it marches down streets in search of prey.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its stomach fills most of its torso. It wanders the same path every day, searching for fresh food.
Generation IX.Violet: It spends its waking hours searching for food. When Yungoos is hungry, its ferocity gains a certain edge.

Generation VII.Sun: Routes 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , Hau'oli City , Kala'e Bay Day Verdant Cavern
Generation VII.Moon: Routes 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 6 , 8 , Hau'oli City , Kala'e Bay Day
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Routes 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , Kala'e Bay Day Verdant Cavern

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Inlet Grotto East Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three West Province: Area One , Area Two , Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Inlet Grotto East Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three West Province: Area One , Area Two , Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
